TextLibrary.Text: We should follow whatever it is that has escaped this lab.
We should follow whatever it is that has escaped this lab.
Very well. How do we track it?
Very well. How do we track it?
It must have taken a shuttle. It has a few days on us, but your ship is fast, we can follow its engine trail and try to overtake it.
It must have taken a shuttle. It has a few days on us, but your ship is fast, we can follow its engine trail and try to overtake it.
